# isSurrogate(_:)

**Type Method**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified code unit is a high or low surrogate code unit.

## Declaration

```swift
static func isSurrogate(_ x: Unicode.UTF16.CodeUnit) -> Bool
```
